蠥字的基本解释

蠥
niè
忧；忧患：“启代益作后，卒然离蠥。”
古同“孽”。

蠥字的汉语字典释义

[①]［niè］
［《廣韻》魚列切，入薛，疑。］
(1)妖孽。
(2)作祟；为害。
(3)忧愁；忧患。

蠥字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蠥； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页1102第14
【唐韻】【集韻】【正韻】?魚列切，音蘖。【說文】衣服謌謠，草木之怪謂之祅，禽獸蟲蝗之怪謂之蠥。【六書正譌】別作㜸，非。俗用孽，亦非。　又憂也。【楚辭·天問】啓代益作，后卒然離蠥。【註】言禹以天下禪與益，皆去益而歸啓，益卒不得立，故曰離憂也。　【集韻】亦作?。

蠥字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
蠥字的起名意思

暂无。

蠥
Basic explanation of words
蠥
niè
Worry; Worry: "After Qidaiyi worked, I suddenly left."
Ancient Tong "evil".
蠥
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［niè］
["Guang Yun" cut the fish line, enter Xue, doubt. ]
(1) Enchanting.
(2) Harmful; harm.
(3) Sorrow; sorrow.
蠥
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　蠥; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 1102 14
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Fish column cut, sound tiller. [Said the text] The rumors of clothes, the grotesque of vegetation, the grotesque of the beasts and the locusts are called the worms. 【Liushu Zhengzheng】Don’t make it, no. The vulgar uses evil, nor is it.　Worry again. [Songs of the Chu·Heavenly Questions] Qidai Yizuo, and then abruptly left. [Note] Yan Yu uses the world's Zen and benefits, both to benefit and return to enlightenment, and benefit and death cannot stand, so it is said to be free from worry.　【Jiyun】also made?.
